Sentencas: This paper investigates the performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with two types of solid electrolytes, namely oxygen ion-conducting (SOFC-O2-) and proton-conducting electrolytes (SOFC-H+).
Titulo: Performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells: Proton and oxygen ion conductors

Sentencas: Our previous work reported that the SOFC-H+ shows superior theoretical performance over the SOFC-O2- electrolyte.
Titulo: Performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells: Proton and oxygen ion conductors

Sentencas: However, in this work when all resistances are taken into account, the actual performance of the SOFC-O2- (Ni-YSZ/YSZ/YSZ-LSM) becomes significantly better than that of SOFC-H+ (Pt/SCY/Pt).
Titulo: Performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells: Proton and oxygen ion conductors

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the SOFC-O2- is about 34 times higher than that of the SOFC-H+ when operated at an inlet H2O:EtOH ratio of 3, a fuel utilization factor of 80% and a temperature of 1200 K.
Titulo: Performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells: Proton and oxygen ion conductors

Sentencas: Then the required values of the total resistance of the SOFC-H+ to achieve the same power density as the SOFC-O2- were determined.
Titulo: Performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells: Proton and oxygen ion conductors

Sentencas: It was found that due to the superior theoretical performance of the SOFC-H+, it is not necessary to reduce the SOFC-H+ total resistance to the same values as the one for SOFC-O2-.
Titulo: Performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells: Proton and oxygen ion conductors

Sentencas: The study also indicates that reduction of only the electrolyte resistance is not sufficient to improve the SOFC-H+ performance and, therefore, the other resistances including activation, electrodes and interconnect resistances need to be reduced simultaneously.
Titulo: Performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells: Proton and oxygen ion conductors

Sentencas: Finally, the improvement of the electrolyte resistance by changing its resistivity and thickness is discussed.
Titulo: Performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells: Proton and oxygen ion conductors
